snippet.title: Kanso, your moment of Zen.  iOS trailer.
snippet.description:
Immerse into a colourfully ambient space, effortlessly glide through each world, and find your moment of Zen.
iOS:  https://apps.apple.com/app/id1384257762
Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1454650/Kanso/


Kanso is a hyper relaxing follow the line game where players avoid obstacles while tracing around circular forms. 

Designed to be a refuge from the noise of daily life.  Bringing players of every skill level into a meditative state of flow, an immersion into a calming experience.

Inspired by the Zen calligraphy practice of Ensô, where every day you paint an uninhibited ink circle on a blank sheet of paper.
Expressing a physical moment of reflection, focus, and freedom of flow.  

Kanso is carefully balanced to invoke the flow of this calligraphic practice as a unique gameplay experience.  As you move around the circular forms, avoiding the Koi like Daemons, you will also find this flow, this moment of Zen.

Players navigate through ten worlds and explore over three hundred levels.  Each level with a different circular shape to follow and guiding energies to avoid. Following their own distinct movement pattern.  Some follow you, others avoid you, all of them moving in predictable paths that gently draw you into a tranquil gaming experience.


Quotes
“a lot of fun and damn, it is so relaxing” (gamingcouchpotato.co.uk)
“I guarantee it's relaxing”  (combocaster.pt)
“joy to play” “a real surprise and a little treasure” “Perfect for a moment of relaxation” (steam reviews)
